author: OrchidAlloy
description: Steals emojis and stickers sent by other people and optionally uploads them to your own server. Supports context menu commands. Can also upload stickers from mobile.
install_msg:
😶 __**EmojiSteal**__ ```EmojiSteal installed. Instructions:
1. Load the cog with [p]load emojisteal
2. Try replying to a message containing emojis or stickers from another server with [p]steal or [p]steal upload
3. Optionally, enable the context menus with [p]slash enablecog emojisteal, then [p]slash sync```
short: Steals emojis and stickers sent by other people.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
